nws.name: Overnight

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain between noon and 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 52. Southwest wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Rain Showers Likely
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain between 7pm and midnight, then rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a low around 40. South wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 43. Southwest wind 9 to 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm, then a slight chance of snow showers between 7pm and 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 17. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
